    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AquaColorStrategy
    Strategy for aqua color (code 1).
    BeigeColorStrategy
    Strategy for beige color (code 6).
    BlueVioletColorStrategy
    Strategy for blue violet color (code 2).
    Board
    Main board interface composed of segregated interfaces.
    BoardStateSnapshot
    Immutable snapshot of board state used for undo functionality.
    Brick
    Interface representing a Tetris brick (tetromino).
    BrickGenerator
    Interface for generating bricks in the game.
    BrickGeneratorFactory
    Factory for creating brick generator instances.
    BrickGeneratorFactory.GeneratorType
     
    BrickRotator
    Manages brick rotation state and operations.
    BurlyWoodColorStrategy
    Strategy for burly wood color (code 7).
    ClassicTheme
    The classic theme using the original game colors and style.
    ClearableBoard
    Interface for row clearing operations.
    ClearRow
    Immutable data class representing the result of clearing complete rows.
    ColorMapper
    Maps color codes to Paint objects.
    ColorStrategy
    Strategy interface for color mapping.
    ColorStrategyRegistry
    Registry for color strategies.
    ControlsPanel
    Controls panel displaying all game controls and their functions.
    DarkGreenColorStrategy
    Strategy for dark green color (code 3).
    DefaultLevelStrategy
    Default implementation of LevelStrategy.
    DownData
    Immutable data class representing the result of a downward movement.
    DownMoveCommand
    Command for moving a brick down.
    EventSource
    Enumeration indicating the origin of a game event.
    EventType
    Enumeration of all possible player input event types in the game.
    GameController
    Coordinates game logic and user input.
    GameOverPanel
    Panel displayed when the game ends.
    GameTimer
    Manages the game timer for automatic piece dropping.
    GameViewModel
    Handles data-to-UI transformations for game rendering.
    GuiController
    Main GUI controller for the Tetris game interface.
    HardDropMoveCommand
    Command for hard dropping a brick instantly to the landing position (ghost position).
    HighScoreManager
    Manages high score persistence and tracking.
    InputEventListener
    Listener interface for handling player input events.
    InputHandler
    Handles keyboard input for the game.
    LeftMoveCommand
    Command for moving a brick left.
    Level
    Represents a game level with its configuration.
    LevelManager
    Manages level progression based on lines cleared.
    LevelStrategy
    Strategy interface for level configurations.
    LinesClearedTracker
    Tracks the total number of lines cleared across the game.
    Main
    Main entry point for the Tetris JavaFX application.
    MainMenuPanel
    Main menu panel displayed when the application starts.
    MatrixOperations
    Utility class providing static methods for matrix operations used in the game.
    MovableBoard
    Interface for board movement operations.
    MoveCommand
    Command interface for move operations.
    MoveEvent
    Immutable data class representing a movement event in the game.
    NeonTheme
    A high-contrast neon theme with a dark background.
    NextShapeInfo
    Immutable data class representing information about the next rotation of a brick.
    NotificationPanel
    Animated notification panel that displays score bonuses or other messages.
    PausePanel
    Panel displayed when the game is paused.
    RandomBrickGenerator
    Random brick generator that creates bricks randomly from all seven tetromino types.
    RedColorStrategy
    Strategy for red color (code 5).
    RetroTheme
    A retro theme inspired by classic handheld consoles.
    RightMoveCommand
    Command for moving a brick right.
    RotateMoveCommand
    Command for rotating a brick.
    ScorableBoard
    Interface for score access.
    Score
    Manages the game score using JavaFX properties.
    SimpleBoard
    Concrete board implementation.
    SpawnableBoard
    Interface for brick spawning operations.
    Theme
    Interface defining the visual appearance of the game.
    ThemeManager
    Manages the active theme of the application.
    TransparentColorStrategy
    Strategy for transparent color (code 0).
    UndoData
    Result wrapper for undo operations.
    ViewData
    Immutable data transfer object containing all information needed to render the game view.
    WhiteColorStrategy
    Strategy for white color (default/fallback).
    YellowColorStrategy
    Strategy for yellow color (code 4).
